## Properties

| Property      | Attribute    | Description                      | Type      | Default     |
| ------------- | ------------ | -------------------------------- | --------- | ----------- |
| `buttonLabel` | --           | The label of the snackbar button | `String`  | `undefined` |
| `withButton`  | `withbutton` | Display a button in the snackbar | `boolean` | `false`     |
